content:
Computer Weekly have just posted their piece: "UK and EU AI communities will only be globally significant if they work as one", covering their interview with co-founder of CLAIRE, Holger Hoos.
https://www.computerweekly.com/news/252477132/UK-and-EU-AI-communities-will-only-be-globally-significant-if-they-work-as-one
CLAIRE, ELLIS, EurAI, BDVA and euRobotics have completed the Joint Strategic Research, Innovation and Deployment Agenda (SRIDA) for the new European Partnership on AI, Data and Robotics.
